summary: I am a persuasive and innovative person with experience in social media, content marketing and SEO. I am deeply passionate about digital marketing, where my main interest lies in the creation and execution of marketing campaigns and optimisation opportunities. I believe that by combining a data-driven approach with creativity and therefore marrying logic and magic, a campaign will achieve the impact needed in order to become successful.

[{'company': {'id': 1943138, 'name': 'AssistiveWare', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQFywgLZ-4YHJQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1566635220051?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=NO7yDmjY3kBUojouw5gWHZAnY-gw3srTk9aZEGDowhs', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/assistiveware/', 'employees': {'start': 11, 'end': 50}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Amsterdam, North Holland, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'AssistiveWare', 'description': "As a Social Media Manager at AssistiveWare, I lead a team of 6 members to create and execute social media strategies that increase brand awareness and strengthen our company's relationship with the community. I also collaborate with the editorial and design team to create and implement social media and advocacy campaigns.

Key responsibilities: 
* Leading the social media and community team to create and execute social media strategies that align with our company's goals and objectives.
* Collaborating with the editorial and design team to create and implement social media and advocacy campaigns that increase brand awareness and engagement.
* Developing a long-term (5-year) social media strategy to align with the company's vision and growth objectives, as well a yearly action plan. 
* Analysing results continuously to find insights for content creation and optimisation, and report on key metrics to stakeholders.
* Creating the influencer strategy to maximize the reach and impact of our social media campaigns.
* Supervising community management to build and strengthen our company's relationship with our customers through social media channels and Facebook groups.
* Coordinating online and onsite events to engage with our customers and build brand awareness.", 'title': 'Social Media Manager', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': 'Amsterdam, North Holland, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'company': 'AssistiveWare', 'description': "As a Junior Marketing and Communications Manager, I was part of the social media and community team and responsible for the content calendar creation, influencer research, and community building.

Key responsibilities:
* Working with the social media and community team to create and implement social media strategies that align with our company's goals and objectives.
* Creating and managing the monthly content calendar, including seasonal campaigns and paid ads, to ensure a consistent and engaging social media presence.
* Researching and identifying influencers that align with our brand and engaging with them to build relationships and maximize the impact of our social media campaigns.
* Building and nurturing our community on social media channels through engagement, customer service, and social listening.
* Collaborating with the design team to create visually appealing social media content that resonates with our audience.
* Analysing social media metrics to track the success of our campaigns and identify opportunities for optimization and growth.", 'title': 'Junior Marketing and Communications Manager', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Global Savings Group Amsterdam / Imbull', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Amsterdam Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'company': 'Global Savings Group Amsterdam / Imbull', 'description': 'As a Content Marketing Analyst, I was responsible for creating and optimizing content for a portfolio of retailers, analyzing traffic and data, applying SEO strategies, and coordinating with various teams to execute effective affiliate marketing campaigns.

* Creating and optimizing content for a portfolio of retailers to improve conversion rates and drive revenue growth.
* Analyzing traffic, bounce rate, Google rankings, revenue, and data from internal CMS and affiliate networks to identify areas of improvement and increase conversion rates.
* Researching and applying SEO strategies and techniques to increase traffic and revenue.
* Analyzing marketing trends and optimizing retailer landing pages accordingly to improve overall domain performance.
* Coordinating with freelancers, account managers, and other departments to execute and optimize effective marketing campaigns.
* Conducting competitor research and analysis to deliver the best offers on the affiliate marketing landscape.
* Conducting keyword research and updating content to improve organic search rankings and drive traffic.
* Creating strategies, together with key account managers, to ensure the best outcome of organic and paid campaigns.
